title: Is stenography important? Are there any possibilities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes stenography is important. When you go to the court room you can easily find a stenographer in every Court. Each and every sector needs stenographer for their officers. Why stenography is important? Let's go to an example. Now a days you can easily record speeches. But, somewhere it is not safe. Sound recorder and camera also catch ecos and other sounds in that room. So when you work on your valuable meeting you can easily disturbed by this sounds. There is a solution. A stenographer can easily solved it because stenographer's duty is to write officers speech not the sounds of that room and Echoes. If you have knowledge about Assembly's meeting then you said that there was lots of people talking and collapses to each other. But you have to write the speech of the leader not the others speech. If you recording the sound then you will be perplexed. Here's a stenographer solve this problem. In parliament, there was same problem. But it was solved by the stenographer. In my opinion there is a possibility. Going through my words, you can easily find what is the importance of a stenographer and what is the possibility to become a stenographer. There is a possibility to become a stenographer. If you learn stenography in your language( but I suggest to learn in English) and qualifying the exam you can easily find a job of a stenographer. The Court of every district of the state recruit stenographer and SSC also in every year. So there is an opportunity. Please, study hard practice more and more. Be legend of stenography. You can achieve your goal. That's all.
